author: Simon Difford
description: I started with a classic three equal parts Negroni, simply subbing rum for gin, but the rum was masked by the bitter liqueur so I boosted rum notes with a splash of cachaça.
name: Rum Negroni
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
